snippet: A special prosecutor to investigate corruption is expected to be named soon, but falling confidence in the president and the political process itself is imperiling the mission before it begins.
abstract: Mexico is facing ever-widening breach between political class and demands for change from a public that is exasperated by rampant corruption and feeling increasingly less confident about Pres Enrique Pena Nieto.
lead_paragraph: A special prosecutor to investigate corruption is expected to be named soon, but falling confidence in the president and the political process itself is imperiling the mission before it begins.

headline.main: Mexico Faces Growing Gap Between Political Class and Calls for Change
headline.print_headline: Mexico Faces Growing Gap Between Political Class and Calls for Change

keywords.value: Escuela Normal Rural Raul Isidro Burgos (Guerrero, Mexico)
